Items.Title: Application no. 20055604 SCX, a proposed site for a 2,300 seat public school facility, known as Mott Haven School Campus, located at 680 Concourse Village in Council District no. 16, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: School Construction, Mott Haven School Campus, Bronx (20055604SCX)
